website_summaries.verdict: With bright colors, classic characters, and easy-to-handle bricks, this set is worth considering for preschool Disney fans.
pros: This set earns praise for the adorable theme that celebrates birthdays
Features Mickey and Minnie Mouse, and has numbered bricks to help little ones learn
Designed for ages 2 to 5 years with Duplo bricks that are made for little hands
cons: Rarely, the pieces of the train won't snap together securely or stay attached
Older kids may find it too simple or childlike

website_summaries.verdict: This 24-piece set offers figurines for role playing, while also sparking basic building skills.
pros: Kids love the birthday theme for Minnie Mouse and Mickey Mouse
Children can put together the train set or they can play with individual train cars separately, making it great for multiple children to share and play together
Great price point yields a good value for preschoolers
cons: Train size is smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: We Love this Toy!
customer_reviews.text: We Love love love this toy :) It is super cute, my daughter loves the cupcake with candle! Three train car pieces makes it lots of fun to use with other Lego Duplo kits, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracking Packages

customer_reviews.title: Best (and only) Mickey Mouse Duplo set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 1 year old son. He loves the Mickey Mouse. This is the only duplo Mickey set I could find, so options are limited. He enjoys all the "cars" that came with it too. Oh, and Minnie's dress is cloth and can be placed on other small toys. His playskool spider-man wore it for about a month...
customer_reviews.author: Kbp2003

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy! I used it at a cake topper ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable toy! I used it at a cake topper for my son’s Mickey themed birthday party. Now I want to buy him more Duplo trains.
customer_reviews.author: Bayou Babe

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for my 2 1/2 year old daughter. She loves legos and Minnie/Mickey Mouse. The legos in the package are slightly larger than the traditional legos due to the young age of the target audience. It comes with a rather large Mickey and Minnie. Minnie also has a fabric pink skirt that you can take on/off. Each section of the train "snaps" together and stays relatively stuck together. A lot of other trains we have does stay together very well so each section is everywhere. My one complaint is the "directions" are not really clear and there is a cupcake that I cant figure out how to put together.
customer_reviews.author: tmb

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Gave this for my nephew's 2nd birthday and man was he a happy boy! He really enjoyed playing with this train, very easy to assemble, fun to play (especially if the boy likes trains/cars) and safe for kids since the blocks are big enough to make it hard for kids to put into the mouth. If you have ever seen kids play, you'll know how important it is for the toys not to have sharp or little pieces as it can be accidentally swallowed by the kids. Overall, very happy with it considering how happy my nephew is when he gets it. Money well spent I say
customer_reviews.author: the good neighbor

customer_reviews.title: Put down that device!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 3yo. We discovered Duplo for her and she loves them! She also has a children's kindle fire. If your concerned your child may be spending too much time on a devise, get some Duplo sets! We have a total of 4 different sets. Along with her father and sisters, we spend hours creating things, and her device mostly gathers dust! If you want your small child to spend more time creating, and playing, I recommend you purchase some Duplo blocks sets.
customer_reviews.author: JimofSalem

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for Mickey fans
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a gift for my daughter's second birthday. She was very excited to receive this as she's Mickey Mouse's biggest fan. She has fun counting and stacking the numbered blocks and labeling the colors and parts. And she totes Mickey and Minnie around the house with her. She usually plays with this set as shown on the box - she hasn't mixed them with other Duplo sets yet. The train cars do not stay hitched to one another very well and this is the reason for only giving this set four stars. And Minnie usually falls over for some reason when she's driving the train through the house.
customer_reviews.author: Megand89

customer_reviews.title: HOME RUN!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for my grandson's second birthday. Both he and his 4-year-old brother are enjoying it very much. 1. The LEGO Duplo pieces are of a size that is easily manipulated by small 2-year-old hands; 2. The Mickey Mouse characters and train theme are universally popular with this age group; 3. The birthday theme of this set (cupcake with a candle,on top, presents, etc.) made it an extra special birthday gift. A big hit all around!
customer_reviews.author: VY

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I used this toy to decorate a cake. It was perfect for half sheet cake
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Was it just my kid or....?
customer_reviews.text: First time yesterday 1/27/19- I liked it ok but I think that they come apart too easily when my grandkid touched (the train) to move. It’s a train it is suppose to move or slide! He was getting frustrated that it was hard moving it to ride down the “pretend tracks” and every time he went to touch minnie or mickey they never stayed on when he put them in a particular space. I will see if he gets better at handling this particular set and update this review. when he would take off of one place they would fall off.
customer_reviews.author: East Coast Lady 2

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2+ years old niece. This was her first Lego set ever. I watched my niece play with it and realized that after a few trials she learned how to make a train out of it. It is made very wisely that it becomes easy for children to memorize patterns and super colorful to keep their interest (hardest part). I'm absolutely going to get my niece another set.
customer_reviews.author: SBM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my grandsons birthday
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just turned 3, he's a huge fan of Mickey mouse, I honestly didn't think he'd much care after receiving other toys on his birthday. Let me tell you, this was his favorite! Perfect sized blocks for his hands, he loves the way he can take it apart and put it together the way HE wants It! And he makes Mickey and Minnie "take turns" holding the balloons. Awesome gift, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: sandy7898

customer_reviews.title: The cup cake set can’t be stacked
customer_reviews.text: I like this set when it is finished. It looks so pretty and interesting. Checking other’s reviews, it can also be a decoration on the birthday cake. But the only thing is that there are two pieces of the cup cake set which can’t be stacked together which made me frustrated. How can be like that if they are the same models in the factory? I can only make the second option which looks weird. Because I have thrown the box and I don’t want to take time for the return and purchase again. That’s it!
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Great legos for little ones
customer_reviews.text: My 1 and 4 year old have recently fell in love with building things and are obsessed with Mickey and Minnie. When I saw these legos were big, so safe for the little one I couldn’t pass it up. I do wish it came with a few more pieces, but overall it’s a cute building set that they’re constantly playing with.
customer_reviews.author: Laura McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Great Disney themed toy.
customer_reviews.text: The product inside the box was fine, however, product box arrived ripped open. Had I been giving this to someone other than my family I would be embarrassed by the condition of the box.... Please figure out why this is happening... For crying out loud this is a toy for a toddler no reason for rough handling of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Victorian Rose

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is soo cute. We purchased for our son's birthday! He loves Mickey and the balloons. Personally, I love Minnie in her little dress! There are many ways to play and it is compatible with the other Lego Duplo sets.
customer_reviews.author: CJmom

customer_reviews.title: My 2 yr old daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter has spent countless hours enjoying this little train. It is well made and I couldn't be happier with it! She has had it for 4 months now and it is still her favorite toy. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price for so few pieces.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this train lego set and It is very cute. That being said. There are very few pieces to play with and not much else to do with it once it's set up. He bored of it fast. For the price I think a full set of legos is more worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Higuera

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR FUN AND CREATIVITY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 3 year old granddaughter who is Mickey Crazy. She loved working with the Legos and playing with Mickey and Minnie figurines. It contained a perfect amount of blocks and items for her to play with and not be overwhelming like many Lego sets are. She loved playing with them in her little pool and at bath time. Will make a great gift for this age as well. A parent can see how well a child likes to work with Legos with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Legos for the Mickey Toddler Fans
customer_reviews.text: We bought these legos for my two-year old's birthday. He, and his four-year-old sister, loved them. There are not a ton of building pieces, so they are good for making the train on the picture as well as for adding to other duplos you have on hand. The kids love the Minnie and Mickey characters, the balloons and the cupcake birthday pieces especially. It's essentially what you are paying for, so this set the best for birthday kids and Mickey Mouse fans.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Braswell

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old has played with this train nearly every day since her 2 yr birthday. She loves putting it together in carious ways, singing happy birthday and then taking it apart. We keep it apart in the box so it's always ready for her to put together again. One of her favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: K5

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute set I got for my daughter’s 2nd bday. She can easily snap the train together and stack the blocks wherever she wants. The cupcake is so fun! She has played with it every day so far 3 months and counting. Comes with everything shown.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIRST LEGO SET! After used as 1st Bday cake topper!
customer_reviews.text: Two classics in one...Mickey & LEGO...how can you go wrong? This set is ADORABLE and it absolutely made my son’s Mickey Mouse First Birthday cake. When we were done with the cake, we washed it off with Dawn in about five minutes and it’s been a great Mickey toy ever since...and his first LEGO set!!! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: White Elephant of Westchester's REAL REVIEWS!

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love Mickey?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 2-year-old daughters birthday. She loved it so much. It was easy to assemble for her and myself. There are no instructions so I suggest using the photo for reference. Great quality. We love Lego Duplo blocks, they have been great for both our little girls over the years.
customer_reviews.author: FiscallyFitFamily

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love Mickey and Minnie
customer_reviews.text: Mostly large pieces and very cute scene. Maybe mine was a bad box but it came with a few smaller pieces not safe for my child. Luckily I built it with him so quickly pulled those pieces. Very colorful And simple to use, kids love duplo!
customer_reviews.author: Daved

customer_reviews.title: Mickey duplo is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute set and Duplo LEGO’s make a wonderful gift. They are fun and challenging for those youngsters who aren’t ready for LEGO’s but like to build. All the pieces are pretty big and easy to put together and take apart. Just be careful, these still hurt if you step on them!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A Peters

customer_reviews.title: It's fair
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's good early age start lego However couple of blocks came loose
customer_reviews.author: Sunmy yoo

customer_reviews.title: Lego, Duplo, Disney, Train
customer_reviews.text: These was a gift to my niece. She likes me, loves Lego, and I also love trains. And she has a romance with Disney and Mickey and Minnie Mouse are two of her favorites characters. So this set was the obvious choice. She is very pleased and happy with her new toy and I feel very satisfied. Lego, you did it again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Avila Arquin

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Duplo kits
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Duplo kits, and the combination of Duplo and Mickey is an absolute hit in my household. It is very simple for little guys to figure out (or adults who are on the ground playing as well!). We have a ton of Duplo sets as others know we will build with them, and this is a great addition to our collection.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: Toy to last for the ages
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously adorable! Duplo quality never disappoints. Our 2-year old son loved this as a Christmas gift. The bright colors are so cute and we know this is a set that will last for our grandchildren!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They toy is pretty small for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year-old LOVES this toy. He loves Mickey and he loves trains, so this was a no brainer. They toy is pretty small for the price, but he loves the Mickey and Minnie charachters and putting together the parts of the train. He also loves the cupcake with the candle.
customer_reviews.author: BrookeG

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so much fun for my kids, ages 1 and 3. The quality is great. The colors are cute. My kids use this in conjunction with the Duplo cake set and the two compliment each other very well. They can make trains and desserts as well as dessert birthday trains.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Belle

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 1/2 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old granddaughter has had a lot of fun building and playing with this. As usual Lego has crafted a well done product.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Toddler fun
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old granddaughter loves it. And she has blocks all over the place. Ha ha Duplo blocks are very well made. Great toys and gifts.
customer_reviews.author: NMiles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney fans!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute little Duplo set for Disney fans! My kids adore it. Gave it to my son for his 3rd birthday and he was so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Ada Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute train set. Fits with all of our other legos too. Bought for my sons 2nd birthday because he loves both Mickey and trains. My 4 year old loves the set too. Months later and they still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my 4 year old great-grandson.
customer_reviews.text: Sent to my great-grandson in Hawaii for Christmas/Birthday. He loves Mickey Mouse anything so this was a great choice. He also loves Legos and things he can put together, and he's 4. I'm not with him in HI, so can't give all the particulars, but to know that his grandparents on the other side of his fam say this works, is good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDeeB

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my granddaughter, she loved it! And duplo blocks are not as evil as LEGO when you step on them in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.author: Kell of Westeros

customer_reviews.title: I give this 4 stars because my 2 1/2 yr ...
customer_reviews.text: I give this 4 stars because my 2 1/2 yr old loves it and it keeps her busy for a while and encourages her imaginative play. However, I do feel the price is steep for what it actually is. If I rated it just based on price, I would give 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: EmD

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 3 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Gave the Legos to the birthday girl and she was thrilled. Every little ones her age surrounded her and they were getting the LEGOs out of the box even though they had many more gifts to open.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry E Carter

customer_reviews.title: purchased for toys for tots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the Toys for Tots program I never saw this toy. So my review is just to clear this item off my list of products to review.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My two year olds loved this. Helped with hand eye coordination. They are also bigger than your typical legos so they don’t hurt as much if you step on them
customer_reviews.author: Capri D Morris

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves this
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this! I love that it has details like Minnie's skirt and the balloons. Great product that provides hours of entertainment... although I do find many of the pieces under the couch from time to time lol
customer_reviews.author: paul s. chang

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this.... It works with other Legos and they love the Mikey and Miney mouse Legos were a hit with the girls for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Hamand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Our two year old little girls absolutely LOVEs her train set!! She enjoys switching the balloons from Mickey to Minnie’s hands. I’m definitely going to look into buying the other Duplo train additions and sets!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the younger LEGO builder
customer_reviews.text: Legos for our 3 year old “I can do it” granddaughter who wants to build legos like her older brother. The set was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: A hit with our 2-year old granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My two year old granddaughter had a Mickey themed birthday and received many Mickey and Minnie gifts. When the dust settled, this was the toy that kept her attention. Both she and her three year old sister love it.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: my daughter is a huge mickey mouse fan and she ...
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is a huge mickey mouse fan and she loves to play with duplos, so this was a must have for her second bday. it is slightly smaller set than others in this price range because it is a character set, but that was okay with us as it works with the rest of her collection.
customer_reviews.author: SpiDerPiG

customer_reviews.title: My grandchild loves this!
customer_reviews.text: If your grandchild loves Mini and Mickey Mouse like mine does, he/she will love this set. There is the added bonus of the birthday theme, making it fun to sing the birthday song as you roll the train carrying the birthday cake with candle. I keep this Duplo set at my house. My grandchild runs to get it our soon after arrival.
customer_reviews.author: MaryEl

customer_reviews.title: great purchase for a 1st or second birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: great purchase for a 1st or second birthday gift. toddlers love mouthing the different shaped pieces, my sin i snow obsessed with mickey and minne and talks to them! LOL! as he grows he will be able to play with it more in different ways. my older kids (5,10 yrs) are also enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: ateeq and amina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing!!!!, very good product. Excellent balance between price and quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute cute, i like the little Mickey and Minnie. My son enjoys it! Good for toddlers
customer_reviews.author: BETTER  and STONGER

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for two year old boy birthday cake topper, it was a hit! Great size pieces for little hands. Find him sitting and playing with it, talking to Mickey and Minnie. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Easy
customer_reviews.text: My two year old nephew was obsessed with this gift on Christmas! It’s super easy for that age group to use. He loved the concept of it being Minnies birthday. It tells a story which is great for young children!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great Mickey toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Mickey so she really likes this toy. She's 18 months and doesn't really like trains yet so not getting much use out of that part but loves the blocks and figurines
customer_reviews.author: Hampton Family

customer_reviews.title: Great play value.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old granddaughter loves this toy. She has played with it for at least 15 minutes. She loves Mini Mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Rospotynski

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons age 9 months and 3 years. Both boys love theses blocks. Have to keep the small pieces put away from the baby
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The cupe cake did not fit well . but good over all
customer_reviews.author: rosa sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the girls
customer_reviews.text: Bright color gives them hours of fun and me some peace
customer_reviews.author: muriel s.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: My little one is s Mickey club house fun and he loves this Lego's
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Disney and duplo for young creators
customer_reviews.text: Great set for disney obssesed builders. A few good pieces, but overall not a lot to do with this set other than the basic train.
customer_reviews.author: Chris James

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great little gift. Nephew loved it and exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: ryan overman

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Used these to decorate a birthday cake for grand daughter’s 3rd birthday. She couldn’t wait for them to come off to play with them!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: easy to build with instructions. daughter likes this a lot
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Leggos are the best toys
customer_reviews.text: Leggos are the best toys ever it provides inter generational fun for everyone! They foster creativity and imagination!
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters second birthday and she loves it. She can put the pieces together herself.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A

customer_reviews.title: So cute for a toddler birthday!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! My son actually got two of these for his second birthday and I wish I had known about it for his first. It has # 1-5 on blocks that you can add to the birthday cupcake. It will come out every year for his birthday. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Another Quality Lego Offering
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 2.5 year old daughter. She loves Minnie Mouse, Legos' Duplo train app, and building with Legos/Duplos with her older siblings. This gift was the ultimate trifecta!
customer_reviews.author: GeekyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great train set from duplo. Mickey and Minnie do look a bit odd but hey, they're made into block figs so I guess that can't be helped.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: Great option for Mickey fans
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy for Mickey fans and a good way to introduce Legos.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Very good toy that will bring enjoyment to you toddler! Safe and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Colon

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Kids Love It!
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much better than Mickey and Legos together. At least not if you ask this family! We bought these for my daughter's 2nd birthday. She loves them, but so does my 8 year old daughter. They are high quality like you would expect from Lego and Disney. My only wish is they had more characters in there!
customer_reviews.author: Heather T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: we always order legos; amazon makes the gift giving easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Evans

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun with Mickey and Minnie on the LEGO Train!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a little one who loves Mickey/Minnie Mouse and Lego’s this is the best gift!! My 2 year old granddaughter loves this and has spent a lot of quiet time mixing and matching the lego’s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this toy. He is 3 years old and he can easily assemble it. Great buy for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Might be better for 4-5 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our soon to be 3 year old who's Mickey mouse obsessed, he loves the Mickey mouse figure and the train cars, doesn't really care about building right now.

customer_reviews.title: Not giftable because of damaged box
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged, it cannot send as a gift. I save it for my kids, they have fun with it though.

customer_reviews.title: Great little Lego set
customer_reviews.text: My 2 y/o nephew is super into Disney and he absolutely loved this gift! Box was in mint condition and product was as advertised. Would purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: This toy makes a great table decoration to go with the cake.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that at 24 pieces our 2 year old could put it together with some grandparent support.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson’s 4th birthday and he loves playing with it.

customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loved receiving this for birthday and blends well with the other Duplo sets she has.

customer_reviews.title: Great Duplo Disney Set
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 1/2 yr old granddaughter played with this for hours. Really great value!

customer_reviews.title: Duplo blocks are the number one toy in my little home daycare!
customer_reviews.text: My kids grew up with Lego's and now I have Duplo's for the younger kids and they love them. Can be so creative and that's important to me.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, FUN Lego for grandchild. Loves the Disney characters. I loved all the interesting pieces! Every child should have one of these! May every adult!

customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy LEGO set for small kids. My boys love the Mickey characters and the bright colors

customer_reviews.text: Mickey is loved in our home and this has become a cute birthday decoration for the cake table:)

customer_reviews.author: Wade P. Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Our granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our granddaughter as part of her birthday gift for her second birthday. Needless to say, it was a big hit. She loves the little people that come with it, and carries them around all the time. It's a very high quality set and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: suemm88

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Came in a solid box like out of the store. Cheaper, great gift.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly she carries the Mickey and Minnie around but this is her first lego set and I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old daughter and she LOVES it. Mostly she carries the Mickey and Minnie around but this is her first lego set and I am happy with my purchase. Great price too. Cheaper than Walmart in store.

customer_reviews.title: legos
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the transitioning little guys from mega blocks to the next step
customer_reviews.author: JFelty

customer_reviews.title: Kids love!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the lego duplos! We bought these for Christmas and they havent gotten bored of them!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: My one year old loves this
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set. Got this for our one year old who loves Mickey. She discovered that the candle is also a whistle and has a lot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego
customer_reviews.text: Lego quality as expected. Awesome toy son loves it also connects with other trains from the same size block.
customer_reviews.author: CETS

customer_reviews.title: Easy for clumsy toddler fingers!
customer_reviews.text: We used this as a decoration for daughter's mickey mouse birthday party and as a toy afterwards. She's 2 and is obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jones

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Party Fun
customer_reviews.text: This went over big with my cousin's little boy for his 2 year old birthday party. He loved the train and being able to put the little legos together but they were still big enough for his little hands to manipulate without getting frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Easton

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Fun, fun fun. This is a great addition to my grand daughter's Lego duplo set.
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loves playing with them. One of her favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old got this for her birthday and loves to help build the train and drive the train around.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Vanden Berge

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My friend's daughter loves this train set. She is two and it was a birthday gift. You can't go wrong with Disney and. Duplo.
customer_reviews.author: WellerFan

product_meta.title: LEGO DUPLO Disney Mickey Mouse Clubhouse Mickey & Minnie Birthday Parade 10597 Disney Toy (24 Pieces)
product_meta.description:
All aboard the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse birthday train as Mickey and Minnie throw a parade in your honor! Load up the train with everything you need for the perfect birthday party; a buildable cake, balloons and decorated gift bricks. How old are you today? With decorated age bricks numbered from 1 to 5, Mickey and Minnie can bring birthday fun year after year. Young children will love the endless birthday role-play opportunities of this LEGO Disney toy and will develop their construction skills with the big, bright LEGO DUPLO bricks designed especially for budding builders. Includes 2 LEGO DUPLO figures: Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse.

BRAND STORY
By DUPLO

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Celebrate your birthday with Mickey and Minnie! Bring on the birthday fun with LEGO DUPLO-Mickey Mouse Clubhouse-Mickey and Minnie Birthday Parade with train, cake and number bricks. All aboard the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse birthday train as Mickey and Minnie throw a parade in your honor! Load up the train with everything you need for the perfect birthday party-a buildable cake, balloons and decorated gift bricks. How old are you today? With decorated age bricks numbered from 1 to 5, Mickey and Minnie can bring birthday fun year after year. Young children will love the endless birthday role-play opportunities and developing their construction skills with the big, bright LEGO DUPLO bricks designed especially for budding builders. Number bricks from 1 to 5 help children learn their age and promote early number recognition. Includes 2 LEGO DUPLO figures: Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse.

See more
feature_bullets: Build a birthday train featuring your favorite Disney characters, including a buildable birthday cake, balloons, a candle and three gift-decorated bricks
Includes two DUPLO figures, Mickey and Minnie Mouse
LEGO DUPLO Disney building toys are compatible with all LEGO DUPLO sets for creative building
Train measures over 7-inch high, 13-inch long and 2-inch wide
24 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 2 and 5 years old
